Class UpdateTaskCommand

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.commands.UpdateTaskCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public final class UpdateTaskCommand extends Object implements Command
Command that updates an existing task to a new snapshot.

Implements the Command design pattern:

  • execute() updates the task to the afterSnapshot state.
  • undo() restores the task to the beforeSnapshot state.

    • UpdateTaskCommand

      public UpdateTaskCommand(ITasksDAO dao, ITask beforeSnapshot, ITask afterSnapshot)
      Constructs a new UpdateTaskCommand.
      Parameters:
      dao - the tasks DAO (must not be null)
      beforeSnapshot - snapshot of the entity before update (must not be null)
      afterSnapshot - snapshot of the entity after update (must not be null)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null

      Returns:
      the command name

    • execute

      public void execute() throws TasksDAOException
      Executes the update by applying the afterSnapshot.

      Ensures both snapshots belong to the same task ID before performing the update.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Throws:
      TasksDAOException - if the IDs mismatch or the DAO update fails

    • undo

      public void undo() throws TasksDAOException
      Undoes the update by restoring the beforeSnapshot.
      Specified by:
      undo in interface Command
      Throws:
      TasksDAOException - if the DAO update fails
